relation: Deadline for technical assessment of joint proposals
Final queue/schedule, and ITAC & Gemini feedback to NGOs
Proposals received by National Gemini Offices (NGOs) - see partner pages.
NGO associated with PI of proposal submits technical assessment
Scientific assessments by each Gemini partner ("National TAC").
Electronic transmission of proposals to Gemini from NTACs
International Time Allocation Committee meets to resolve issues and recommend programs.
The response time is 7 days for checking by NGOs (from "For Review") and by Gemini CSs (from "For Activation").
PI deadline for submission of completed Phase II Programs to National Offices (earlier submission is encouraged).
NGO deadline for submission of completed Phase II Programs to Gemini.
2010B programs may be observed earlier to fill queue nights.
